page.title: 19CHANGES IN DEBDEN
page.content: Mrs.Glen Heath and Mrs.Jean Bunting are sisters-in-law who have lived in the area all their lives.They have seen very many changes.When they were young they used to play out on the roads,but there is too much traffic today. Many more people live here now. When Mrs.Heath and Mrs.Bunting were young they knew everybody in the village,but now there are too many to know them all.There used to be two shops,as well as an undertakers,a shoe mender,and a prison. Whenever they wanted to go out of the village they used to go on their bicycles,but now they can go by car. Mrs.Heath and Mrs.Bunting think that the proposed new development of housing to be built at{"Highfields"}is a good idea as it will make more homes for young people.
